trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Vertegenwoordigt een verzameling verwante secties binnen een configuratiebestand.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationSectionCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> objects.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ConfigurationSectionCollection gebruiken om te doorlopen van een verzameling van <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>objecten.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: U kunt toegang tot deze verzameling van objecten met behulp van de <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A>eigenschap of de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ConfigurationSectionCollection wordt ook gebruikt bij het maken van aangepaste typen die een uitbreiding van de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Voegt een <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object toe aan de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Standaard met deze methode wordt de opgegeven <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>object als deze niet al is opgenomen binnen de verzameling.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the section to be added.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de sectie moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: The section to be added.
trans-unit.target: De sectie moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: Clears this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wist u dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kopieert <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object aan een array.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to.
trans-unit.target: De matrix te kopiëren de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object aan.

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: De indexlocatie waarop u wilt beginnen met het kopiëren.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
trans-unit.target: De lengte van array kleiner is dan de waarde van plus index .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sections in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt u het aantal secties in dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of sections in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Een geheel getal dat het aantal secties in de verzameling vertegenwoordigt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objecten van dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objecten van dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object met de opgegeven naam.

trans-unit.source: name is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameis null of een lege tekenreeks ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een enumerator die kunt sequentieel opgehaald via deze <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>die kunnen worden gebruikt om via deze <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De sleutel van de opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objecten van dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object waarvan de sleutel moet worden geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De sleutel van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Wordt gebruikt door het systeem tijdens serialisatie.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: De methode GetObjectData, komen wordt gebruikt tijdens de serialisatie; dat wil zeggen, wanneer het behouden blijven van configuratiegegevens naar een configuratiebestand.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De toepasselijke <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: De toepasselijke <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>object.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap wordt de opgegeven invoer van de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>object.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: In C# is deze eigenschap de indexeerfunctie voor de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap wordt de opgegeven invoer van de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>object.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: In C# is deze eigenschap de indexeerfunctie voor de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object met de opgegeven naam.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De sleutels voor alle opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objecten in dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the keys of all sections in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>-object dat de sleutels van alle secties in deze verzameling bevat.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Verwijdert de opgegeven <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object uit deze <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The name of the section to be removed.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de sectie moet worden verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Verwijdert de opgegeven <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> object uit deze <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section to be removed.
trans-unit.target: De index van de sectie moet worden verwijderd.
